entry.title: fdz-marco/StickyUI-JS: A lightweight JavaScript library for creating dynamic, draggable UI elements and controls for web applications. Particularly useful for canvas-based applications or HMIs (Human Machine Interfaces).
entry.content: A lightweight JavaScript library for creating dynamic, draggable UI elements and controls for web applications. Particularly useful for canvas-based applications or HMIs (Human Machine Interfaces).

entry.title: Macktireh/job-tracker-api: Job Tracker API is a lightweight RESTful service built on Cloudflare Workers that helps manage job applications with full CRUD operations. It leverages OpenAPI 3.1 with chanfana and Hono for automatic documentation generation and request validation. The API uses SQLite/D1 for data persistence and provides clean error handling
entry.content: Job Tracker API is a lightweight RESTful service built on Cloudflare Workers that helps manage job applications with full CRUD operations. It leverages OpenAPI 3.1 with chanfana and Hono for automatic documentation generation and request validation. The API uses SQLite/D1 for data persistence and provides clean error handling

entry.title: skrijwan100/simple-auth-kit: A lightweight and reusable authentication package for Node.js projects using MongoDB, JWT, and bcrypt. Just connect your MongoDB URI and you're ready to register or login users with a few lines of code.

entry.title: kunalcoder45/Cravid: Cravid is a simple, elegant, and lightweight wallpaper application built using React Native. It allows users to browse and download high-quality wallpapers directly to their devices. With a smooth and intuitive user interface, users can easily set their favorite images as wallpapers and even share them with others.
entry.content: Cravid is a simple, elegant, and lightweight wallpaper application built using React Native. It allows users to browse and download high-quality wallpapers directly to their devices. With a smooth and intuitive user interface, users can easily set their favorite images as wallpapers and even share them with others.

entry.title: narcisolobo/countsy: Track anything. Count everything. A lightweight app for creating, updating, and managing personal counters.

entry.title: shubhs27/NoMoRecs: A lightweight Chrome extension designed to help users focus on their chosen content by blocking YouTube's recommendation algorithm. Whether you're working, studying, or just want to avoid the rabbit hole of endless video suggestions, NoMoRecs helps you stay on track with your intended viewing.
entry.content: A lightweight Chrome extension designed to help users focus on their chosen content by blocking YouTube's recommendation algorithm. Whether you're working, studying, or just want to avoid the rabbit hole of endless video suggestions, NoMoRecs helps you stay on track with your intended viewing.
